title: Porphyrin photosensitizer molecules as effective medicine candidates for photodynamic therapy: electronic structure information aided design
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29368-29383
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05585C, Paper

Wei-Huang Yin, Peng-Yuan Li, Hou-Hou Huang, Lu Feng, Shu-Hui Liu, Xin Liu, Fu-Quan Bai
Novel porphyrin photosensitizer molecules, incorporating perylene diimide groups (PDI), were meticulously designed and screened using electronic structure calculations.
